name: Journey to Shadow Lust Mountain
description:
Running from the hunt.  Hiding amongst the dead.  A young witch hastily decrypts a forbidden tome looking for answers:  a way to rid herself of hunger—a way to avoid interacting with her death-wishers. 

She soon finds out a hasty decryption is often a failed one, as she becomes more drawn to the people who want her burned alive. 

A troubled traveler offers an escape.  She’s drawn to his lips; believes every word he says.  They’re desperate and lonely enough to fall for each other.  But kindness is only a ruse.  Can a friendship really bloom amid a witch hunt?
